lines: I am a soldier of Gondor.
I have trained all my life to kill Orcs. But may the Valar save me if a Troll comes knocking!
Curse the Southrons, and their curved swords!
They say the Men of Harad are well nigh all under the sway of the Enemy.
If not for the brave Men of Gondor, the world would have succumbed to the Shadow a long time ago.
My kin protect these lands.
Do not think Gondor weak, #p. In heart and spirit, we Men of Gondor shall always remain strong.
Beware the slimy Orc, but fear more the Wainrider on his chariot. Though that race we have neither fought nor faced for many generations.
We live in fear here, #p. If you seek safety, I would advise you to travel to the lands of the Prince.
There have been foul airs on the wind of late. We fear something is gathering behind the mountains of ash.
It would take thousands of Orcs to bring down even a dozen good Gondorians!
Should anything foul march upon Gondor, then the Rohirrim would ride to our aid. I am sure of it.
Our enemies are gathering beyond the Harnen.
There are ill rumours out of the Harad. Men say the Southrons are massing all their strength in the lands beyond the Harnen.
If the Enemy should send all his might against us, #p... well, I doubt we would see another dawn!
I pity the rangers in Ithilien, #p. They will be the first to fall.
I very much doubt our aged defences can withstand the might of Mordor. Yet still, I shall fight to my last, for the freedom of Men.
For Gondor!
Sons of Gondor! Hold your ground!
You are an enemy of the throne of Gondor, #p!
By the White Tree, I will see you slain!
I swear to Gondor that your death shall be swift!
Your death shall be swift, #p!
No pity for the foes of Gondor!
You will not see the end of this day, servant of the Shadow!
I will not allow you to harm the free folk of Gondor, #p!
See that you do us no more harm! Or I shall see to it myself!
You shall not lay another hand on our people!
In the name of the Kings of old, I shall destroy you!
You may go no further. You will not enter Gondor!
You may not enter Gondor, #p!
Enemies have entered Gondor!
No enemies of Gondor may pass freely into our land!
Leave this land, #p, never to return!
Begone, you fell creature of the Shadow!
Begone, thrall of the Shadow!
Begone from Gondor, thrall of the Enemy!
Crawl back to your master in the Land of Shadow!
Begone from our lands, foul scum of Mordor!
Begone from our lands, thrall of Sauron!
I fight for Gondor, #p.
May our deeds restore Gondor to its former glory!
The foes of Gondor shall fall before us!
Our enemies are right to fear the might of Gondor, #p!
You are a true friend of Gondor, #p.
Today, we fight! For Gondor!
We shall follow you through death and ruin!
We are proud to fight among a warrior so great as you!
For Gondor! For all the good in this world!
The scum of Mordor shall face our wrath!
Ruin to all the enemies of Gondor!
